explanation: [0-0] On an iron plate, there's a puddle of dark syrup with a large bubble on it. A pair of white-gloved hands are touching the syrup, and there are spatulas and scissors around the syrup.
[0-6] Then, the white-gloved hands grab and lift the bubble from the syrup as a woman wearing a pink short-sleeved shirt and a black apron smiles and watches.
